message: I'm excited to offer you this great product, and I think it's worth a lot to you. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $125.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $125. Would you be willing to consider $110?
I understand you're still trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $110. I'm willing to compromise at $130, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're not willing to go as low as $110, but I'm still trying to get a good deal. Would you be willing to consider $115?
